```{r setup}
library(tt)
library(ggplot2)
library(lemon)
```

```{r}
data(mtcars)
head(mtcars)
```

```{r}
ggplot(mtcars) +
  geom_point(aes(wt, mpg)) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(1, 6), breaks = seq(1, 6)) + 
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(10, 35)) +
  theme_tmth() +
  coord_capped_cart(left = "both", bottom = "both")
```
